NODE is being created, designed and implemented as we speak. So far, these are the folks who have helped make it happen. We expect all NODE members to help us co-create amazing spaces and communities in the future.

MAOMAO HU
Maomao is a co-founder at Kora, which is focused on bringing financial freedom to as many people as possible.
NODE SF
Seth Goldstein
In 2008, Seth created one of the first co-working spaces in SF at Pier 38. Many great companies were born there, including Instagram.
Miriam McGovern
Miriam is an artist, gallerist, event producer and art car manager.
Sean Hoge
Sean is the managing partner at venturecoin.io He finds and advises some of the best up and coming projects in the crypto space.
Monica Puchner
Monica is the CEO of HiLo, a new social network for crypto. She is also the namesake of the character in Silicon Valley.
Steven Waterhouse (Seven)
Dr Steven Waterhouse is a recognized innovator and leader in the emerging world of crypto, and is co-founder of Orchid.
Kristina Goett
Kristina is an accomplished interior designer, a beauty industry entrepreneur, and sometimes fit model for Levis.
